findings.details: Disabled hover transforms for homepage latest-posts cards under prefers-reduced-motion to reduce motion on mobile/keyboard focus.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan for placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts found none.
Removed duplicate dateModified microdata from post cards to reduce conflicting metadata.
Recent posts present; no placeholder content detected during spot checks.

recommendations: Re-run external link checks when network access is available.
Continue to validate microdata after template changes.
